item.title: behold the a(i)ppocalypse — ruminating on the death of the App Store
item.description:
Now, considering the sorry state of LLM1 benchmarks insofar as it concerns the probably only remotely reliable test for “generalized intelligence,” Humanity’s Last Exam, it is likely going to be a while before we have to contend with a globalized SkyNet coming to rapture us all to cyberspace.

There seems, however, to be unfolding the demise of an early victim. It squeaks like a canary in the coal mine — if you will — of where unrelenting human greed and increasing automation is likely to drive us all eventually. I am, of course, talking about The App Store.
